pages.text: The $(major)Black Death/$ Gene $(bad)instantly kills whoever has it/$.$(br2)Given the strength of this Gene, it's much harder to acquire than the other plagues.

To craft this DNA Helix, you'll have to get a full Syringe that has $(bad)$(bold)every other negative Gene/$ in the game. This includes all the other plagues, but excludes any disabled Genes.$(br2)From there, simply brew that Syringe into a Potion of Viral Agents.
